content: **drops crochet jumper and scarf in ull-flame with borders in snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see crochet scarf pattern here 1 ---------------------- **size** s m l xl - xxl finished measurements bust 90-98-108-116-126 cm / 35-3/8 - 38-5/8 - 42 5 - 45-5/8 - 49-5/8 hem 84-92-102-110-120 cm / 33 - 36 25 - 40-1/8 - 43 25 - 47 25 **materials** drops ull-flamé from garnstudio discontinued 500-550-600-650-700 gr nr 01 natural and use drops snow from garnstudio 200-200-200-250-250 gr nr 01 natural drops 8 mm / us 11 needles or size needed to obtain correct gauge drops 10 mm / us p crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/91-26-b---crochet-scarf
